name: Fuse & Run
description:
Fuse and detach to get the right colors.

Use the boxes for puzzles and movement.

Be fast to get the best time possible!

Rinse and repeat until you optimize your route.

Oh, and don't forget to share your high score in the comments :)

-------- CONTROLS --------

Although it is limited, there is gamepad support for the player.

Movement : A W S D / Left Stick

Jump : Spacebar / South Button

Hold for Fuse : Left Click Hold / R-Trigger Hold

Hold for Detach : Right Click Hold / L-Trigger Hold

Reset Run: R / Start Button

-------- USED ASSETS --------

Only used audio related assets. Scripting and modelling is all done by me :)

I used UModeler instead of Blender and it was amazing.
